CustomField.formula: IF ( AND(Sans_Activites_En_Cours__c =true, Sans_Activites_Terminees__c =true) , "WITHOUT" , IF(OR(Sans_Activites_En_Cours__c =true, Sans_Activites_Terminees__c =true) , "WITH" ,IF ( AND(Sans_Activites_En_Cours__c =False, Sans_Activites_Terminees__c =False) , "WITH" , "--" ) ) )
CustomField.label: Activities indicator
